鞜鞜鞜

鞜字的基本解释

鞜
tà
皮鞋：“绨衣不敝，革鞜不穿。”
鼓声：“鼓钟鞺鞜。”

鞜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tà］
［《廣韻》他合切，入合，透。］
(1)皮鞋。
(2)同“”。鼓声。

鞜字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞜； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1388第38
【廣韻】他合切【集韻】託合切，?音踏。【玉篇】鞮也。【廣韻】革履。【揚雄·長楊賦】革鞜不穿。【註】師古曰：鞜，革履也。　又【集韻】達合切，音沓。本作鞈。詳前鞈字註。

鞜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鞜字的起名意思

暂无。

Gaze
Basic explanation of words
Gaze
tà
Leather shoes: "You can't wear satin clothes, but you can't wear leather."
Drums: "Drum Bell Moyue."
Gaze
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tà］
["Guangyun" he is close, close and thorough. ]
(1) Leather shoes.
(2) Same as "". drum.
Gaze
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞜; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1388 Page 38
[Guang Yun] He cuts well [Ji Yun] Holds cuts together, and the sound pedal. [Jade articles] Yan Ye. [Guang Yun] Leather shoes. 【Yang Xiong·Chang Yang Fu】Leathers are not worn. [Note] Shi Gu said: 鞜, leather shoes.　[Jiyun] Daheqi, sound. This is a joke. Please refer to the previous note of the word.
